name: Legend of Krannia: Cursed Fate (itch)
description:
ATop-down Fantasy Medieval 2d Action Deckbuilding Game. Collect skills, Level up, Customize your Gameplay and Manage your stats. It has a Complex 2d Controls with skill switching, blocking and dodging.

Tons of Skills you can use to match your game strategy! 

Game Features
  • Topdown 2d action Deckbuilding game
  • Complex 2d Controls with skill switching, blocking and dodging (with cancellations!)
  • Equip Skills, and Manage your stats
  • Collect skill, level up, customize your gameplay
  • Beautiful Levels
  • Unique and Interesting Bosses
  • Wacky Stories

_____________________________________________________________

Volume I will have a gameplay that will run approximately 5 hours and approximately 20 hours upon full release.


You can look forward to:

  • Main Story Quest
  • Beautiful Maps
  • Unique and Interesting Bosses
  • Challenging Combat
  • Equipment and Skills management through Deckbuilding

We plan to finish the game with 7 volumes. Leading up to release. we plan to add more features, mechanics, and quality of life changes.

Some of the additions you can look forward to are:

  • Crafting System
  • Deck Set Bonuses
  • Additional Monsters, Maps, Quests and Stories.

We plan to provide constant updates to ensure Improved Graphics and Skills Effects, Improved Narration and Balancing.”
